org.qbroker.receiver

Class FileReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qbroker.receiver.Receiver
      • org.qbroker.receiver.FileReceiver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageReceiver

    public class FileReceiver
extends Receiver
    FileReceiver monitors a file or page on a server and retrieves the file from it. It can also run a script and packs the output to the message. The JMS Messages will be put to an XQueue as the output. FileReceiver supports flow control and allows object control from its owner. It is fault tolerant with retry and idle options.

    In case of the script, please make sure to redirect the STDERR to STDOUT or close the STDERR, since FileReceiver only reads from its STDOUT.
    Author:
    yannanlu@yahoo.com
